courses.title: Complete Thesis Guidance
courses.description: Comprehensive support and assistance in developing and completing a thesis for academic or research purposes.

courses.title: Research Paper Guidance
courses.description: Assistance and advice in conducting research, analyzing data, and writing research papers for publication.

courses.title: Research Paper Publish Guidance
courses.description: Support in navigating the process of publishing research papers, including selecting journals, formatting, and submission guidelines.
